languages.text: {n}Взгляд Авриллы полон тревоги — и раскаяния.{/n} "Люди, видно, совсем отчаялись... увидели спецотряд и решили, что терять нечего. Ох, прошу прощения, Лорд-капитан. Это вопиющая ситуация. Я уверена — вас просто не узнали, иначе подобного бы не произошло. Мы примем меры — когда текущий кризис разрешится..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Взгляд Авриллы полон тревоги — и раскаяния.{/n} "Люди, видно, совсем отчаялись... увидели спецотряд и решили, что терять нечего. Ох, прошу прощения, Лорд-капитан. Это вопиющая ситуация. Я уверена — вас просто не узнали, иначе подобного бы не произошло. Мы примем меры — когда текущий кризис разрешится..."

languages.text: {n}Vent's gaze is full of worry — and regret.{/n} "The people are getting desperate, clearly... They saw the assault unit and they decided they had nothing left to lose. I mean, I apologise, Lord Captain. It is outrageous. I'm sure the people simply didn't recognise you — it wouldn't have occurred otherwise. We will deal with them — once the current situation is resolved..."
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Авриллы полон тревоги — и раскаяния.{/n} "Люди, видно, совсем отчаялись... увидели спецотряд и решили, что терять нечего. Ох, прошу прощения, Лорд-капитан. {n}Vent pales slightly.{/n} "The people are getting desperate, clearly... They saw the assault unit and they decided they had nothing left to lose. I mean, I apologise, Lord Captain. It is outrageous. I'm sure the people simply didn't recognise you — it wouldn't have occurred otherwise. We will deal with them — once the current situation is resolved..."

languages.text: {n}温特的目光中充满了担忧与遗憾。{/n}“很显然，那些人变得越来越绝望……他们看到突击队来了，已经决定放手一搏了。我是说，我很抱歉，舰长大人，这样的暴行确实令人无法容忍。我相信，那些人仅仅是没有认出您来，否则绝不会发生这种情况。等目前的问题解决之后，我会处分他们的……”
languages.original_text: {n}Vent's gaze is full of worry — and regret.{/n} "The people are getting desperate, clearly... They saw the assault unit and they decided they had nothing left to lose. I mean, I apologise, Lord Captain. It is outrageous. I'm sure the people simply didn't recognise you — it wouldn't have occurred otherwise. We will deal with them — once the current situation is resolved..."

traits.locale_text: {n}温特的目光中充满了担忧与遗憾。{/n}“很显然，那些人变得越来越绝望……他们看到突击队来了，已经决定放手一搏了。我是说，我很抱歉，舰长大人，这样的暴行确实令人无法容忍。我相信，那些人仅仅是没有认出您来，否则绝不会发生这种情况。等目前的问题解决之后，我会处分他们的……”

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Vent están lleno de preocupación... y de pesar.{/n} «La gente está recurriendo a medidas desesperadas, evidentemente... Han visto a la unidad de asalto y han decidido que no tenían nada que perder. Perdón, mis disculpas, Lord Capitán. Es intolerable. Seguro que no {mf|le|la} reconocieron... de haberlo hecho, nunca {mf|le|la} habrían atacado. Nos encargaremos de ellos... cuando resolvamos la situación que tenemos entre manos».
languages.original_text: {n}Vent's gaze is full of worry — and regret.{/n} "The people are getting desperate, clearly... They saw the assault unit and they decided they had nothing left to lose. I mean, I apologise, Lord Captain. It is outrageous. I'm sure the people simply didn't recognise you — it wouldn't have occurred otherwise. We will deal with them — once the current situation is resolved..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Vent están lleno de preocupación... y de pesar.{/n} «La gente está recurriendo a medidas desesperadas, evidentemente... Han visto a la unidad de asalto y han decidido que no tenían nada que perder. Perdón, mis disculpas, Lord Capitán. Es intolerable. Seguro que no {mf|le|la} reconocieron... de haberlo hecho, nunca {mf|le|la} habrían atacado. Nos encargaremos de ellos... cuando resolvamos la situación que tenemos entre manos».

languages.text: {n}ヴェントのまなざしには心配と後悔が滲んでいる。{/n}「人々は自暴自棄になっているのです…突撃部隊を見て、もう失うものはないと判断したのです。その、ロード・キャプテン、申し訳ありません。なんという非礼を。彼らはただ、ロード・キャプテンを認識できなかったのでしょう。そうでなければ、このような事態にはならなかったはずです。我々が彼らを対処します…現在の状況が解決されれば…」
languages.original_text: {n}Vent's gaze is full of worry — and regret.{/n} "The people are getting desperate, clearly... They saw the assault unit and they decided they had nothing left to lose. I mean, I apologise, Lord Captain. It is outrageous. I'm sure the people simply didn't recognise you — it wouldn't have occurred otherwise. We will deal with them — once the current situation is resolved..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴェントのまなざしには心配と後悔が滲んでいる。{/n}「人々は自暴自棄になっているのです…突撃部隊を見て、もう失うものはないと判断したのです。その、ロード・キャプテン、申し訳ありません。なんという非礼を。彼らはただ、ロード・キャプテンを認識できなかったのでしょう。そうでなければ、このような事態にはならなかったはずです。我々が彼らを対処します…現在の状況が解決されれば…」

languages.text: {n}Vents Blick ist voller Sorge ... und Bedauern .{/n} "Die Leute sind offenbar langsam verzweifelt ... Sie haben die Sturmeinheit gesehen und entschieden, dass sie nichts mehr zu verlieren haben. Ich meine, es tut mir leid, Lord Captain. Es ist unerhört. Die Leute haben Euch gewiss einfach nicht erkannt, sonst wäre das nicht geschehen. Wir kümmern uns um sie. Sobald die aktuelle Lage geregelt ist ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Vent's gaze is full of worry — and regret.{/n} "The people are getting desperate, clearly... They saw the assault unit and they decided they had nothing left to lose. I mean, I apologise, Lord Captain. It is outrageous. I'm sure the people simply didn't recognise you — it wouldn't have occurred otherwise. We will deal with them — once the current situation is resolved..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vent erblasst leicht.{/n} "Die Leute sind offenbar langsam verzweifelt ... Sie haben die Sturmeinheit gesehen und entschieden, dass sie nichts mehr zu verlieren haben. Ich meine, es tut mir leid, Lord Captain. Es ist unerhört. Die Leute haben Euch gewiss einfach nicht erkannt, sonst wäre das nicht geschehen. Wir kümmern uns um sie. Sobald die aktuelle Lage geregelt ist ..."

languages.text: {n}Le regard de Vent se fait inquiet… et empreint de regrets.{/n} « De toute évidence, ces gens sont à bout... Et quand ils ont vu l'escadron d'assaut, ils se sont dit qu'ils n'avaient plus rien à perdre. Je suis navrée, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, ça n'aurait jamais dû se produire. Mais je suis sûre que rien de tout ça ne serait arrivé s'ils vous avaient {mf|reconnu|reconnue}. Nous allons nous en occuper... dès que les choses seront rentrées dans l'ordre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vent's gaze is full of worry — and regret.{/n} "The people are getting desperate, clearly... They saw the assault unit and they decided they had nothing left to lose. I mean, I apologise, Lord Captain. It is outrageous. I'm sure the people simply didn't recognise you — it wouldn't have occurred otherwise. We will deal with them — once the current situation is resolved..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard de Vent se fait inquiet… et empreint de regrets.{/n} « De toute évidence, ces gens sont à bout... Et quand ils ont vu l'escadron d'assaut, ils se sont dit qu'ils n'avaient plus rien à perdre. Je suis navrée, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, ça n'aurait jamais dû se produire. Mais je suis sûre que rien de tout ça ne serait arrivé s'ils vous avaient {mf|reconnu|reconnue}. Nous allons nous en occuper... dès que les choses seront rentrées dans l'ordre. »

languages.text: {n}Vent'in suratında endişe ve pişmanlık ifadesi beliriyor.{/n} "Belli ki insanlar çaresizlik içinde... Taarruz birimini görüp kaybedecek bir şeyleri kalmadığını anlamış olmalılar. Affedersiniz Lord Kaptan. Bu davranışları kabul edilemez. Sizi tanıyamamışlardır, eminim. Aksi hâlde böyle bir şey yaşanmazdı. Mevcut durum sonuçlandığında onlarla da ilgileneceğiz..."
languages.original_text: {n}Vent's gaze is full of worry — and regret.{/n} "The people are getting desperate, clearly... They saw the assault unit and they decided they had nothing left to lose. I mean, I apologise, Lord Captain. It is outrageous. I'm sure the people simply didn't recognise you — it wouldn't have occurred otherwise. We will deal with them — once the current situation is resolved..."
